org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman

Class KalmanInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman.KalmanInterface

  • public class KalmanInterface
extends Object
    This class provides an interface between hps-java and the Kalman Filter fitting and pattern recognition code. It can be used to refit the hits on an existing hps track, or it can be used to drive the pattern recognition. However, both cannot be done at the same time. The interface must be reset between doing one and the other.
